seo.title: Largest Contentful Paint Benchmarks for Shopify Supplements Stores (2026)
seo.meta_description: Health-conscious consumers expect fast, trustworthy stores. See how 35 Shopify supplements stores perform on largest contentful paint. Median: 10.5s, Top 10%: 4.2s. Free benchmarks.
keywords: shopify supplements largest contentful paint benchmark
best largest contentful paint for supplements stores
how to improve largest contentful paint shopify

key_findings: The median Supplements store has an LCP of 10.5s, which exceeds Google's recommended 2.5s threshold
Top-performing stores (P10) achieve LCP of 4.2s - 60% faster than the median
A 8x performance gap exists between the fastest and slowest stores in this niche
Even the fastest stores in this niche exceed Google's 2.5s "good" threshold
Source: Boostra analysis of 35 Shopify supplements stores, 2026-01-04.
how_to_improve: Optimize and compress hero images using modern formats like WebP or AVIF
Implement lazy loading for below-the-fold images and defer non-critical JavaScript
Use a Content Delivery Network (CDN) to serve assets from edge locations closer to users
Preload critical resources and fonts to reduce render-blocking time
Minimize server response time by optimizing your hosting infrastructure
Remove or defer third-party scripts that block page rendering
Consider using a headless commerce approach for faster page loads

jsonld.name: Largest Contentful Paint Benchmarks for Shopify Supplements Stores
jsonld.description: Performance benchmark data for 35 Shopify stores in the health supplements industry, measuring largest contentful paint.

variableMeasured.name: Largest Contentful Paint
variableMeasured.description: Median largest contentful paint across 35 stores

acceptedAnswer.text: Largest Contentful Paint (LCP) measures how long it takes for the largest visible element to load on your page. Google considers LCP a Core Web Vital, directly impacting your SEO rankings.

mainEntity.name: Why does Largest Contentful Paint matter for supplements stores?

acceptedAnswer.text: Supplement shoppers are often health-focused and time-conscious. They research thoroughly but decide quickly - a slow site loses them during the critical decision window.

mainEntity.name: What is a good Largest Contentful Paint for Shopify supplements stores?

acceptedAnswer.text: Based on Boostra's analysis of 35 Shopify supplements stores, the median largest contentful paint is 10.5s. Top-performing stores in this niche (top 10%) achieve 4.2s. Google recommends LCP under 2.5 seconds for a 'good' user experience, with anything over 4 seconds considered poor.

mainEntity.name: How can I improve my supplements store's Largest Contentful Paint?

acceptedAnswer.text: Optimize and compress hero images using modern formats like WebP or AVIF. Implement lazy loading for below-the-fold images and defer non-critical JavaScript. Use a Content Delivery Network (CDN) to serve assets from edge locations closer to users. Preload critical resources and fonts to reduce render-blocking time. For a personalized analysis of your store's specific issues and opportunities, consider a professional CRO audit.

mainEntity.name: How does my store compare to other supplements stores?

acceptedAnswer.text: You can compare your largest contentful paint against our benchmarks. If your score is better than 10.5s (the median), you're in the top half of supplements stores. If you're better than 4.2s, you're among the top 10% performers in your industry.
